sentences.en: As she did all these things, she was in a most despondent state.
sentences.cn: 她在做着这些事情时, 心里十分难受.

sentences.en: Gill had been out of work for a year and was getting very despondent.
sentences.cn: 吉尔失业一年了，开始变得非常消沉。

sentences.en: He feels despondent and impotent . He intends to quit.
sentences.cn: 一股沮丧情绪袭来, 甚至有了退出的打算.

sentences.en: He is despondent over his illness.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的病情感到灰心.

sentences.en: He was up for a time and then, without warning, despondent again.
sentences.cn: 他一度兴高采烈, 但忽然又情绪低落下来.

sentences.en: His despondent reverie was suddenly interrupted by someone calling his name.
sentences.cn: 忽然有人惊醒了他的沉思.

sentences.en: I feel despondent when my work is rejected.
sentences.cn: 作品被拒后我感到很沮丧。

sentences.en: Is there any reason to believe that your son was despondent?
sentences.cn: 知不知道有什么理由你们的儿子会这么沮丧?

sentences.en: Jo groaned and leaned both elbows on the table in a despondent atttitude.
sentences.cn: 裘哼哼着,把双肘靠在桌上,一副垂头丧气的样子.

sentences.en: Maybe I should play this needy, despondent waif card more often.
sentences.cn: 也许我应该用用这个迷惑, 多需求的招牌.

sentences.en: She was becoming increasingly despondent about the way things were going.
sentences.cn: 她对情况的发展越来越失望。

sentences.en: We should fall to work cheerfully, and not in a despondent state.
sentences.cn: 我们应该高高兴兴地工作, 不应该悲观失望.

sentences.en: When a loved one has become despondent for no obvious reason.
sentences.cn: 当所爱的人患有抑郁症,但却不知其原因时.

sentences.en: When I get despondent my roommate cheer me up.
sentences.cn: 当我沮丧时,我的同室室友给我鼓劲.

sentences.en: Xiao Ming is quite despondent, for he lost his beloved bicycle.
sentences.cn: 小明突然蔫不唧的, 原来他心爱的自行车丢了.

trans.tran_cn: 沮丧的，泄气的，嗒然，抑郁，意志消沉
